alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Cascade Foothills; Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 27 at 3:03AM PDT until October 28 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures in the mid 30s and where skies are clear will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures around 30 is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Oregon and southwest Washington. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 9 AM PDT this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Cascade Foothills; Willapa Hills
